heading: In these Regulations, -
text_raw:
3. 

In these Regulations, - 

“the Regulations of 2016” means the Greyhound Industry (Control 
Committee and Control Appeal Committee) (Provisional Extension of 
Term of Office) Regulations, 2016 (S.I. No. 491 of 2016), and 

“the Regulations of 2019” means the Greyhound Industry (Control 
Committee and Control Appeal Committee) (Provisional Extension of 
Term of Office) Regulations, 2019 (S.I. No. 429 of 2019).

title: 24 of 1999), and also by sub-section (3) of Section 5 of the said 1958 Act,
heading: 4. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 5(1) (v) of the Greyhound
text_raw:
4. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 5(1) (v) of the Greyhound 
Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal Committee) Regulations 
2007 (S.I. No. 301 of 2007), the term of office of the members of the Control 
Committee who were last appointed to the Control Committee on the 29th day 
of August, 2013, and whose term of office was extended to seven years by the 
Regulations of 2019, is hereby further extended from seven years to eight 
years.

text_raw:
5. Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 11(1) (v) of the Greyhound 
Industry (Control Committee and Control Appeal Committee) Regulations 
2007, the term of office of the members of the Control Appeal Committee who 
were last appointed to the Control Appeal Committee on the 3rd day of 
October, 2013, and whose term of office was extended to seven years by the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th August, 2020.

Regulations of 2019, is hereby further extended from seven years to eight

title: 24 of 1999), and also by sub-section (3) of Section 5 of the said 1958 Act,
heading: 6. Where any member of the Control Committee or the Control Appeal
text_raw:
6. Where any member of the Control Committee or the Control Appeal 
Committee dies, retires or otherwise ceases to be a member of such Committee, 
or where any member has indicated that they are not available to serve on the 
Committee beyond the seven years provided for by the Regulations of 2019, 
the Board may appoint a person to such Committee to take the place of that 
member for the duration of the term of office set out in these regulations.

title: 24 of 1999), and also by sub-section (3) of Section 5 of the said 1958 Act,
heading: 7. A member of the Control Committee appointed to such Committee in
text_raw:
7. A member of the Control Committee appointed to such Committee in 
accordance with Regulation 5 of the Regulations of 2016 shall, for the 
purposes of these Regulations, be deemed to have been appointed to such 
Committee on the 29th day of August, 2013.
text_norm: 7 member control committee appointed committee accordance regulation 5 regulation 2016 shall purpose regulation deemed appointed committee 29th day august 2013

title: 24 of 1999), and also by sub-section (3) of Section 5 of the said 1958 Act,
heading: 8. These regulations shall come into effect on the 28th day of August 2020.
text_raw:
8. These regulations shall come into effect on the 28th day of August 2020. 

Given under the Seal of Bord na gCon 
 26th day of August 2020 

FRANK NYHAN, 
 Chairman of the Board 

An officer authorised by the Board to authenticate the Seal 
of the Board 

GERARD DOLLARD

title: 24 of 1999), and also by sub-section (3) of Section 5 of the said 1958 Act,
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The effect of these regulations is, pending the consideration of primary 
legislation establishing a new Control Committee and Appeal Committee, 
to extend the term of office of members of the current Control Committee 
and the Control Appeal Committee for a further year.
